entry.title: $2700 // Awesome awesome 3 bed ♦♦♦ in the heart of Bushwick
entry.content:
Please text Vaner at show contact info and mention the ID# 21681
3 Bed / 1 Bath in Bushwick, Brooklyn. All Pets Allowed. Nearby subway stations include: Morgan Av, Central Av. Too cheap price? I know, i also can`t understand why it`s so cheap, i would price it at least at 3k. (last year tenant paid 3100)--- Awesome awesome awesome 3 bed in the heart of Bushwick! All great sized bedrooms, central a/c and heat, private balcony attached to one room, laundry in building and nice shared roof! Nicest management i ever met! Located a hop and a skip from both L and JMZ trains. Call now to view!

AMENITIES
Central A/C
High Ceilings
Hardwood Floors
Video Intercom
Laundry in building
Lounge
Outdoor Space
Roof access
Skyline view
Eat In Kitchen
Stainless Steel Appliances
Built in microwave

entry.title: $2599 // GORGEOUS 1br in Luxury Building By JMZ! Tons of Amenities!
entry.content:
Find real community in the heart of Bushwick. This amazing building overflows with amenities!

You'll find a movie theater, game room with pool table, artists workspaces, recording studio, piano in the lounge, courtyard and huge laundry room. The roof deck has unbeatable skyline views, BBQs, lounges and a dog run!

Apartments are bright and airy with huge windows, high ceilings and satin finished hardwood floors. The kitchen is sleek and modern with plenty of storage space, stainless appliances and an island with breakfast bar. The bath features contemporary finishes and has a deep soaking tub.

You'll live surrounded by the best restaurants, cafes, nightlife and galleries that Bushwick has to offer and just 5 minutes walk to the Central Ave M. If you're looking for a real home in the heart of the city, you won't find a better one

--NO BROKER FEE--
Text or call Dave to schedule a viewing!
